CustomField.description: CASE(Owner:User.Profile.Name , 'SalesExecutive Profile', 'Sales promoter', 'SalesOfficer Profile', 'Sales officer','Territory Sales Manager','Sales manager','System Administrator','Admin','Other')
CustomField.formula: CASE( Owner:User.ProfileId , '00e5g000001Ao5B', 'Sales promoter', '00e5g000001BFaT', 'Sales officer','00e5g000001BGl9','Sales manager','00e5g000001eXgW','Admin','00e5g000001Bap8','Interstate Sales officer','Other')
CustomField.label: User job role
